title: Where did my gifts go?
body:
hi 
my son gifted me a champion and a skin, i got the notification but i cannot find them anywhere. And he did not scam anything i watched him buy the points and gift them to me. Ive looked everywhere but just cant find them. anyone help?

replies.body:
That'd be some serious crap if your own son scammed you XD!

I looked over your gifting history and I see that the gifts did go through correctly, and it looks like you were able to find them by now since you were able to use them in matches. For future reference (or if you still can't find them) you can see all your skins on the page for that champion in your Collection tab!

https://i.gyazo.com/ccd3201f9aae8ed5b0f461b30b7a26a5.jpg

thank you broporo...

The issues on this game is just getting too real for me.. sigh,, rather just find another game to play!! too much dramas with Riot.
